name: The Dour Dice Tower (Ben Jones)
description:
Climb a Dour Dice Tower in this Twin-Stick Dicebuilder. Every time you dodge roll, your weapon in rerolled. Spend gold on new weapons to power up and increase your odds of victory! Remember to heal by swapping out your weapons in the shop. 

Each Face of your Die represents a weapon.  Arm yourself with the best possible arsenal to take down the monstrous D-ColloSix. 

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Aim with the mouse.
  • Dodge with Spacebar
  • Shoot with Left Click
  • Open The Shop with Escape (With 150 gold)

Don't forget to swap our your weapons in the shop for a quick heal!
